com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.apis.rest.v3.hateoas

Class HateoasAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.apis.rest.v3.hateoas.HateoasAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
public class HateoasAutoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring auto configuration for HATEOAS module beans.
    Since:
    4.0.0

      ApplicationResourceAssembler applicationResourceAssembler()

      JobSearchResultResourceAssembler jobSearchResultResourceAssembler()
      Provide a resource assembler for job search result resources if none already exists.
      RootResourceAssembler rootResourceAssembler()
      Provide a resource assembler for the api root resource if none already exists.
